name: The American Express Gold Card
shortDescription: Gold has never been this rewarding! Enjoy a complimentary monthly Lifestyle Rewards valued at more than your monthly Card fees. Vouchers can be redeemed at NuMetro, Zando and Takealot.com or for airtime across networks. The rewards you want are there for the taking.

eligibilityRules.description: is a South African resident or has a valid work permit;
has an annual income of R200 000

salesHighlights: The American Express® Gold Card is perfect for everyday shopping and with its budget facility it is perfect for larger purchases.
Automatic basic travel insurance cover of up to R2 000 000.
Free supplementary cards for your spouse or partner.
Quick and easy contactless payment functionality.
Optional Credit life cover to ensure financial security and peace of mind in the event of death, disability, critical illness or retrenchment.
Option to join the Membership Rewards Programme.
Option to join the Nedbank Affinity Programme.

Features: Gold has never been this rewarding! Enjoy a complimentary monthly Lifestyle Rewards valued at more than your monthly Card fees when you spend R3 500 or more per month on your American Express® Gold Card. Vouchers can be redeemed at NuMetro, Zando and Takealot.com or for airtime across networks.Get 12 complimentary visits a year to the domestic Bidvest Premier Lounges.
Our expert team is available 24 hours a day to assist you with all your travel arrangements including flight bookings, car hire, redeem airline miles, hotel bookings and more.
Buy travel tickets on your Gold Card and you will be covered for up to R4 million emergency medical expenses at no additional cost. Optional Comprehensive Top Cover is also available on all travel.
American Express Vacations where you will receive a complimentary dining experience, spa treatment, resort credit offers or complimentary nights.
Affinities: Through the Nedbank Affinity Programme you can choose to support the development of the arts, the preservation and conservation of the environment, sports development or help orphaned and vulnerable children.
Green Affinity - Helping you support the environment at no cost to you
Children's Affinity - Helping the needy children of South Africa at no cost to you
Sport Affinity - Make sport development happen at no cost to you

requiredDocuments.attributeName: South African bar-coded identity card or document, or passport and work permit.

For self-employed clients the above documents as well as a letter from accountant/financial manager confirming income.
